description: A great way to refresh leftover hot cross buns, this delicious dessert features cinnamon butter melted into hot cross buns and caramilk cream cheese.
name: Caramilk & Cinnamon Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 Woolworths traditional hot cross buns, split
3.5 tsp ground cinnamon (save 1/2 tsp to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Line an 18 x 24cm baking tray with baking paper, extending paper 2cm over edges. Place bun bases, cut-sides up, on tray.

Combine butter, sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl until combined. Spread half of the butter mixture over bun bases. Spread remaining butter mixture over cutsides of bun tops. Place tops on bases. Bake for 10 minutes or until warmed through. Allow to cool for 10 minutes.
Top buns with cream cheese, dust with extra cinnamon and serve.
